The story is great. This game was a game changer in its time. If you're interested in game development I reccomend playing with the commentary! Really fricken cool.
Msm após muitos anos do lançamento, esse jogo continua sendo perfeito.
Um clássico,que consegue ser inovador e imersivo até nos dias atuais.

This is a fantastic game. MUST PLAY!!
btw love the end credit music.
It is a great game and I highly recommend it
Good game, though I find GLaDOS about 75% less funny than the game thinks she is - particularly when she's speaking over the developer commentary.

Fun, creative, and challenging. But the levels are such that you never get too frustrated or stuck on something for too long. I only got stuck once in my entire (blind) playthrough, which is a testament to the game's intuitive design. Also, the portal physics are really cool and still hold up after more than 10 years

これは面白い！
老若男女が普遍的に楽しめる作品。
ボリュームもちょうどいいし、数日間頭の体操を楽しめる。
今から15年前にこんなセンスオブワンダーに溢れたゲームがあったとは・・・世界は広い。
ちなみに私は、わからないところはYouTubeのマリン船長の攻略動画を見ながらやりました。
子供の知育にもオススメできる良ゲーです。
portal is pretty fun although not very long it is a fun physics puzzle game

Definitivamente um dos melhores jogos de puzzle que já joguei, facilmente. Bizarro pensar na qualidade que esse jogo tem até hoje, tendo sido lançado em 2007.
Não é em vão que hoje em dia a comunidade desse jogo é ativa ainda.

I bought Portal 1 (and 2) on sale and I definitely think its worth it even at full price. The puzzles are hard but don't take a long time to complete. The game is quite short and you can complete it in a few hours but after that you can also attempt challenges that give extra achievements. I enjoyed the story and I think it was well balanced with the gameplay. The game didn't lag for me even if my computer isn't great for games so it should be able to run without lag for anyone. 9/10
